# unifi_clients (Data Source)

Fetches the list of connected clients for a site.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `site_id` (String)

### Read-Only

- `clients` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--clients))
